trends: There have been 20 other sightings in Malibu
There were 3 other sightings in Malibu on or around May 18th 2013
Summary: 7 lights expanding yellowish glow to diminished glow mo ing in formation triangular linear and random Appearing and disappearing helicopter from point hueneme showed up after
divs: Sighting Details Husband saw bright lights in sky with triangular formation did not know if it was an airplane star and if not a UFO Husband called me from clubhouse yelling came out saw activity called kids and friends all witnessed and took iPhone video do. Intelligent movement triangular linear and random movements increasing in lights then decreasing to disappearing. No sound then helicopter from Port Hueneme direction looked like a double propped helicopter came by this all happened in approximate 12 minutes Everyone was amazed and excited the objects basically vanished in a second . Shortly after extremely high as in star high a single starlight was moving in a deliberate straight line and disappeared Feelings and reactions: amazed and excited
Object Flight Path: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
